LPnpc5e.Settings.shopQuantity.title: Shop quantity
LPnpc5e.Settings.shopQuantity.desc: If no lootsheet shop quantity is assigned to an actor, this will be used as a fallback `shop quantity`.
LPnpc5e.Settings.itemQuantity.title: Item quantity
LPnpc5e.Settings.itemQuantity.desc: If no lootsheet item quantity is assigned to an actor, this will be used as a fallback `item quantity`.
LPnpc5e.Settings.itemQuantityLim.title: Item quantity limit
LPnpc5e.Settings.itemQuantityLim.desc: If no lootsheet item quantity limit is assigned to an actor, this will be used as a fallback `item quantity limit`.
LPnpc5e.Settings.defaultLootCurrency.des: A default/fallback string for currency generation.
LPnpc5e.Settings.reduceVerbosity.title: Reduce Verbosity
LPnpc5e.Settings.reduceVerbosity.desc: If enabled the amount of UI notifications generated by the module will be significantly reduced.
